text: Tsarevo Municipality (, ) is a municipality in Burgas Province, Bulgaria. ==Demographics== === Religion === According to the latest Bulgarian census of 2011, the religious composition, among those who answered the optional question on religious identification, was the following: ==Subdivision== In the municipality enter 13 localities: {| | valign="top" | * Ahtopol * Balgari * Brodilovo * Fazanovo * Izgrev * Kondolovo * Kosti | valign="top" | * Lozenets * Rezovo * Sinemorets * Tsarevo * Varvara * Velika |} == References == ==External links== * Category:Municipalities in Burgas Province
title: Tsarevo Municipality
